targets.query: clusterName.keyword:$cluster AND buildId.keyword:$buildId AND namespace.keyword:$namespace AND pod.keyword:$pod AND container_name.keyword:$container

panels.title: Memory Usage (this metric also includes cached items that can be evicted under memory pressure)

list.definition: {"find": "terms", "field": "pod.keyword","query": "clusterName.keyword: $cluster AND buildId.keyword: $buildId AND namespace.keyword:$namespace AND node.keyword:$node" }
